scripts.predev: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const rootEnv=path.join(__dirname,'../.env'); const localEnv=path.join(__dirname,'.env.local'); if(fs.existsSync(rootEnv)&&!fs.existsSync(localEnv)){fs.copyFileSync(rootEnv,localEnv);console.log('✓ Copied root .env to .env.local')}"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const rootEnv=path.join(__dirname,'../.env'); const localEnv=path.join(__dirname,'.env.local'); if(fs.existsSync(rootEnv)&&!fs.existsSync(localEnv)){fs.copyFileSync(rootEnv,localEnv);console.log('✓ Copied root .env to .env.local')}"
